channel.title: Best SoftWare?
channel.description: Well, im looking for the best song Download site were i can D/l any song for free no virues or sht like that Btw..limewire is being a B*tch to me =\

item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair

@LegendaryLoser wrote:

Click`ere

Works nicely for me, just set it up and use it. Its for more than music.

item.title: Best SoftWare?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“juju, post:11, topic:147178”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=201246.msg1788418#msg1788418 date=1191096223]

Use Frostwire instead of limewire, or just use torrents.

Almost the same thing, same network last time I checked.
[/quote]

It does use the same network(gnutella), everything is the same as Limewire - other then the GUI(which is damn similar). I think moparisthebest just wanted a chance to preach about his cool opensource apps, however, the funny thing is, Limewire is released under the GPL, and has been for a long time.[/quote]

No, Frostwire is Limewire Pro, almost.

Read full topic

item.title: Best SoftWare?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

well you can try messing about with www.dizzler.com which gives free songs but there isn’t a direct way to download them.

You can also try downloading through torrents (which is what i presonally do).
www.thepiratebay.org is the place i use, i used to use www.demonoid.com but apparently its been pwnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Best SoftWare?
item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
@juju wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:10, topic:147178”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=201246.msg1787757#msg1787757 date=1191061443]
Use Frostwire instead of limewire, or just use torrents.
[/quote]

Almost the same thing, same network last time I checked.[/quote]

It does use the same network(gnutella), everything is the same as Limewire - other then the GUI(which is damn similar). I think moparisthebest just wanted a chance to preach about his cool opensource apps, however, the funny thing is, Limewire is released under the GPL, and has been for a long time.

Read full topic

item.title: Best SoftWare?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Or go to www.albumbase.com They have some good albums, and you download it via Rapidshare. But that is also a downside, because you can only download once per hour or something. And I don’t know if it’s virus free.

Many web proxy’s allow rapidshare downloads and still give 100kb/s speeds or so. I’ve done it a few times, the only problem is, it may get corrupt.

Moparisthebest:

Use Frostwire instead of limewire, or just use torrents.

Almost the same thing, same network last time I checked.

Read full topic

item.title: Best SoftWare?

item.description:
@bobby wrote:

The Un-Named:

[quote author=Bobby link=topic=201246.msg1787478#msg1787478 date=1191050564]it takes longer than direct download

How is downloading multiple parts from different people not direct?

Also, torrenting can give you some of the fastest speeds possible. Strength in numbers, or in this case, speed in seeders.[/quote]
ok for me, it is usually slower. any way by direct download, i mean you clilk on link on a website and well not a torrent
